operatingsystemcompatibility: Operating System: Microsoft Windows 2000, XP, Vista; Browser: Internet Explorer 6.0 or above
remotemanagement: • Configuration accessible via web browser • Take snapshots/video clips and save via web browser
protocols: ARP; TCP/IP; UDP; ICMP; DHCP; NTP; DNS; DDNS; SMTP; FTP; HTTP; PPPoE; UPnP
videofeatures: • Adjustable image size and quality • Time stamp and text overlays • Configurable motion detection windows
networkprotocols: • IPv4 • TCP/IP • UDP • ICMP • DHCP Client • NTP Client (D-Link) • DNS Client • DDNS Client (D-Link) • SMTP Client • FTP Client • HTTP / HTTPS • Samba Client • PPPoE • UPnP Port Forwarding • RTP / RTSP/ RTCP • IP filtering • 3GPP • CoS/QoS • IGMP • ONVIF Compliant
systemrequirements: • Operating System: Microsoft Windows 2000, XP, Vista • Browser: Internet Explorer 6.0 or above
videoresolution: NTSC Support: • Up to 30 fps at 176 x 120 • Up to 30 fps at 352 x 240 • Up to 30 fps at 720 x 480 PAL Support: • Up to 25 fps at 176 x 144 • Up to 25 fps at 352 x 288 • Up to 25 fps at 720 x 576
